# Kenney UI Pack (CC0 1.0)

**License:** CC0 1.0 Universal (Public Domain)
**Source:** https://kenney-assets.itch.io/ui-pack
**Author:** Kenney (https://kenney.nl)

## Download Instructions

1. Visit https://kenney-assets.itch.io/ui-pack
2. Download the asset pack (free — "No thanks, just take me to the downloads")
3. Extract the zip contents into this directory
4. The expected structure after extraction:
   ```
   ui-pack/
     PNG/
       ...sprite sheets and individual assets...
     Spritesheet/
       ...combined sprite sheets...
     Vector/
       ...SVG source files...
     License.txt
   ```

## Usage

These CC0-licensed sprites are used for decorative UI elements such as:
- Panel borders and frames
- Button textures
- HUD icons (hearts, coins, stars)
- Menu backgrounds
